title: Gilead Sciences People Analytics Portal
description: Built and scaled comprehensive workforce analytics platform leveraging AWS cloud infrastructure, Tableau visualization, and ThoughtSpot for ad-hoc reporting to enable data-driven HR decision making.
highlights: Designed and built workforce analytics modules including Workforce Summary, Plan, Attract, Organize, Diversify, and Retain
Integrated data pipelines from SAP, Workday, and multiple HR systems into AWS Redshift
Created comprehensive dashboards for HRLT, Talent Acquisition Leaders, and executive stakeholders
Implemented data validation processes between Workday and People Analytics Portal
